casebody.data:
FRANCES P. SYKAS v. MARK J. SYKAS (13401)

Dupont, C. J., and Lavery and Freedman, Js.

Argued January 11 decision released February 13, 1996 Carlo Forzani, with whom, on the brief, were Arnold H. Klau and Donald J. Cantor, for the appellant (defendant). Karen S. Gersten, with whom, on the brief, was Aaron L. Gersten, for the appellee (plaintiff). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
